TopicTitle: Special Agent Kirrim - City In Peril

Articles.Content: If anyone has anyone has ever watched Danny2462's videos, then you should know who Kirrim is, if not, he's bascially a secret agent. I basically imagined what would happen if he was actually a proper Secret Agent, think of it as 007. Without further ado, I present, Special Agent Kirrim - City In Peril. (link because the Kraken attacked the froums AJAX features)
